scenarios.name: Create business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 name = PremiumSalon slug = premium-salon-uc4 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 name = MainLocation slug = main-location timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create stylist A user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_fav_a_uc4 email = fav.a.uc4@example.com name = StylistAVeteran status = active

scenarios.name: Create stylist A resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_fav_a biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 location_id = loc_uc4 type = host host_user_id = usr_fav_a_uc4 name = StylistAVeteran slug = stylist-a-veteran timezone = America/Los_Angeles buffer_before_minutes = 5 buffer_after_minutes = 5 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create stylist E user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_fav_e_uc4 email = fav.e.uc4@example.com name = StylistEJunior status = active

scenarios.name: Create stylist E resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_fav_e biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 location_id = loc_uc4 type = host host_user_id = usr_fav_e_uc4 name = StylistEJunior slug = stylist-e-junior timezone = America/Los_Angeles buffer_before_minutes = 5 buffer_after_minutes = 5 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 name = StylingServices slug = styling-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create styling service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 service_group_id = sg_uc4 name = PremiumStyling slug = premium-styling type = appointment visibility = public status = active

scenarios.name: Create ranking profile
scenarios.prompt: insert into ranking_profiles id = rp_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 name = PrimeSlotFavorability slug = prime-slot-favorability status = active location_id = loc_uc4 service_id = svc_uc4 is_default = true

scenarios.name: Create favorability score for A
scenarios.prompt: insert into ranking_scores id = rs_a_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 ranking_profile_id = rp_uc4 resource_id = res_fav_a score = 9500 percentile = 9800 is_manual_override = true computed_at = 2026-02-22T00:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Create favorability score for E
scenarios.prompt: insert into ranking_scores id = rs_e_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 ranking_profile_id = rp_uc4 resource_id = res_fav_e score = 4500 percentile = 3500 is_manual_override = true computed_at = 2026-02-22T00:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Create service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_products id = sp_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 name = PremiumStylingProduct slug = premium-styling-product kind = booking duration_mode = fixed default_duration_minutes = 60 base_price_amount = 12000 currency = USD status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create required host group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_product_requirement_groups id = sprg_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 service_product_id = sp_uc4 name = StylistRequired slug = stylist-required target_resource_type = host requirement_mode = required min_quantity = 1 max_quantity = 1 selector_match_mode = any allow_substitution = true sort_order = 1

scenarios.name: Create host-type selector
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_product_requirement_selectors id = sprs_uc4 biz_id = biz_salon_fav_uc4 requirement_group_id = sprg_uc4 selector_type = resource_type resource_type = host is_included = true sort_order = 1
